io.craigmiller160.school.repo

Class HibernateStudentDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.school.repo.HibernateStudentDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericEntityDao<Student>, GenericEntityDaoBean<Student>, GenericPaginatedEntityDao<Student>

    @Component(value="studentDao")
public class HibernateStudentDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericEntityDaoBean<Student>
    An implementation of StudentDao using the Hibernate framework. This class depends on a Hibernate SessionFactory to generate the database sessions and connections. This class does NOT manage its own transactions, it will depend on a service layer class to handle that functionality.

    THREAD SAFETY: This class is thread-safe. It has no mutable state that could cause issues with multiple threads.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    craig

      • insertEntity

        public void insertEntity(Student student)
        Insert a new entity into the database. The entity parameter cannot have the same unique ID as an entity already persisted in the database.
        Specified by:
        insertEntity in interface GenericEntityDao<Student>
        Parameters:
        student - the entity to insert into the database.
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - if the database operation fails.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the SessionFactory was set to null.

      • updateEntity

        public void updateEntity(Student student)

        Specified by:
        updateEntity in interface GenericEntityDao<Student>
        Parameters:
        student - the entity to update in the database.
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - if the database operation fails.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the SessionFactory was set to null.

      • getEntitiesByPage

        public java.util.List<Student> getEntitiesByPage(int startPageAfterRow,
                                                 int pageRowCount)
        Get a "page" of of entities from the database, essentially a sub-list of records from the database. The size of a page is defined by the second parameter (pageRowCount). The offset is determined by the first parameter (startPageAfterRow).
        Specified by:
        getEntitiesByPage in interface GenericPaginatedEntityDao<Student>
        Parameters:
        startPageAfterRow - the row in the table to start retrieving records after (eg. if this argument is 10, this method will retrieve records starting with row 11).
        pageRowCount - the total number of rows for the page (the total number of records to be retrieved).
        Returns:
        a sub-list of entities from the table that is a "page" of data, based on the supplied parameters.
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - if the database operation fails.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the SessionFactory was set to null.
